title: In a book, containing 20 pages, one sheet is missing. Sum of the page numbers of the remaining pages is 195. What is the numbers written on both the sides of the sheet must be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let n and (n+1) is the numbers written on the both sides of the missing sheet. acordingly:- 195+n+(n+1). = 1+2+3+4+5+……………20. or. 195+n+n+1=20/2.(1+20). or. 2n+196=10×21 or. 2n=210–196 or. 2n =14 or. n= 14/2=7. , and n+1= 7+1=8 Thus , the numbers written on the both sides of the missing sheet are 7 and 8. Answer.

Ans numbers are 7 & 8 Sum of the page numbers, containing 20 pages=( 20*21)/2= 210 210–195 = 15 means sheet no 4th is missing & numbers writens on both the sides are 7 & 8 because the total of 7+8 = 15
